name: DEAD DOZEN Escape
description: DEAD DOZEN is a Multiplayer Action Horror Game where you turn into a ghoul after your death as a human. Loot, barricade and cooperate when you play as a Survivor or infiltrate, infect and eat your former human friends when you play as a Ghoul.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 and up Processor: i5 and up Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 770 and up Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 4590 MB available space
